summary: This is an email forwarding a Fox News article reporting that forensic pathologist Dr. Michael Baden stated his findings on Jeffrey Epstein's death are more consistent with homicide by strangulation than suicide by hanging. The email anticipates inquiries about this report.

persons.name: Michael Baden
persons.context: He is quoted in a forwarded Fox News article stating his findings on Jeffrey Epstein's death are more consistent with homicide by strangulation than suicide.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the death investigation; the email forwards a news report about the forensic findings regarding his death in custody.

connections.description: Dr. Baden conducted a forensic examination of Jeffrey Epstein's death and presented findings contradicting the official suicide ruling.

events.title: Baden's Homicide Findings Reported
events.description: Forensic pathologist Dr. Michael Baden tells Fox News his findings on Jeffrey Epstein's death are more consistent with homicide by strangulation than suicidal hanging.

keyFacts: Forensic pathologist Dr. Michael Baden publicly disputed the official suicide ruling in Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Baden stated his findings, based on 50 years of experience, were 'more consistent with strangulations' and he had 'not seen' such injuries in a suicidal hanging case.
The email, dated October 30, 2019, forwards this news report and anticipates 'a lot of inquiries' about it.
